text:
Kogane, you've been busy today, huh?
Thanks for your hard work.

Yepp~!
Thanks for yer hard work too, Producer!

You sure you're not too tired?
With more lessons and work piling up...

Thanks~ for worryin' 'bout me!
But... I'm totally fine, really!

Alright, that's good to hear. But hey, if anything comes
up, remember you can always talk to me, okay?

At first, I was kinda panickin'
Couldn't do nuthin' right...

But, havin' you as my producer
Always watchin' over me...!

And havin' supportive friends too
That's why... I can give it my all!

Yeah, that's right. Both me and everyone else...
we're happy to support you, Kogane.

Hehe, thank ya~~
Feels like I'm always bein' helped~

With you as my producer, it feels like I've got the
strength of a hundred people Right now, I feel invincible!!
